content:
I don't have personal opinions or the capacity to observe games in the same way humans do. however, i can provide some information gathered from research. ultima's influence on game design trends and styles is significant, especially in terms of open-world gameplay and character customization. ultima was one of the first games to feature an open-world environment that players could freely explore. this concept of exploration and freedom became a hallmark of the ultima series and has influenced many popular games today, such as the elder scrolls series, grand theft auto, and the witcher series.

additionally, ultima was also one of the first games to offer extensive character customization options. players could design their character's appearance, choose their profession, and even make moral choices that would impact their story and gameplay experience. this level of player agency and player-driven storytelling has become a popular design element in many games, such as fallout, mass effect, and dragon age.

overall, ultima's influence on game design can be seen in many popular games today, and its legacy continues to live on in new game releases.
